response.overview: Fu-Tung Cheng has become internationally known for his sophisticated, understated design and innovative use of concrete in the home. Cheng’s first book, "Concrete Countertops: Design, Forms, and Finishes for the New Kitchen and Bath" (Taunton Press, 2002), has become the authoritative, bestselling guide on how to build a concrete countertop from start to finish. Concrete Countertops tops remodeling lists nationwide and is the perfect companion to Cheng’s DVD title, "Concrete Countertops DIY" for making beautiful concrete countertops.
response.title: Concrete Countertops DIY
